NewsArticle.Title: Baem Missive Decoding
NewsArticle.Content:
<I>Would you like to help me decode some Baem Missives? I feel decoding these new Wind Baem Missives will reveal something exciting that will benefit the both of us. I'll be in Plamit waiting for you...
~Gisaem <I/>
((This quest will be released on Wednesday 25th))
Error & DA Team
